faculties_accepted: Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences (FASS)
Yong Loo Lin School of Medicine (YLLSOM)
visa_info: Exchange students who study for one semester only (180 days or less) are not required to apply for a student visa. However, depending on your country of citizenship, you may have to apply for a visitor visa to travel to Mexico. Singapore citizens do not require a visa to travel to Mexico for a period of entry not exceeding 180 days and for non-gainful activities (tourist). Please check your visa requirement and the latest advice on visa regulations from the Embassy of Mexico in Singapore. [https://embamex.sre.gob.mx/singapur/index.php/consular-services/visas]
